    • Uses of MessageI in cps.mouradalpha.components

      Classes in cps.mouradalpha.components that implement MessageI 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Message
      The class Message implements MessageI, it represents the message structure exchanged with different components in this project.
      Methods in cps.mouradalpha.components with parameters of type MessageI 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Subscriber.acceptMessage​(MessageI m)  
      void Subscriber.acceptMessages​(MessageI[] ms)  
      boolean MessageFilterExampleRectangle.filtrer​(MessageI m)
      The filter need to satisfy this condition : the message needs to have a property named "hauteur" and it's value = 30 , the message needs also to have a property named "largeur " and it's value = 20
      void Broker.notifyPublish​(MessageI[] ms, java.lang.String topic)  
      void Broker.notifyPublish​(MessageI m, java.lang.String topic)
      this method is used to notify other brokers that are in different jvm that a new message for a specific topic is published hence send it to their subscriber
      void Broker.publish​(MessageI[] ms, java.lang.String topic)
      publish messages in a specific topic, it call the publish method behind the scene
      void Broker.publish​(MessageI[] ms, java.lang.String[] topics)
      publish messages in a specific topics, it call the publish method behind the scene
      void Broker.publish​(MessageI m, java.lang.String topic)
      publish a message in a specific topic, the idea is to start by notifying other brokers about the new message before starting distributing it to the subscriber because the the distribution is a heavy operation.
      void Broker.publish​(MessageI m, java.lang.String[] topics)
      publish a message in a specific topics, it call the publish method behind the scene
